Text:
Damn! NFO pseudographics got messed up...But text is intact and it is all that matters.

Video quality is lower than it could be for x264@1400 because source video is 18-years old in some places, being somewhat grainy and hard to compress.
Due to HDD failure i don't have the files anymore, so i won't seed it. There's 6 seeds at the moment. Keep it up, guys...
